title: Paris 2024 Olympics:Paris 2024 Olympics, 1999 ICC World Cup + 5 Bizarre Sports Logos That Left Us Scratching Our Heads
text:
Sports Logos have evolved over the years. The importance of a logo has often had more merit that the team or tournament it is representing. And why not? After all it creates a sense of mystery and anticipation.

Though sometimes they are so bizarre that we are left scratching our heads. There have been many. Here are some that left us speechless:

1. Paris 2024 Olympics

Twitter

Most viewers were confused whether it was meant for a shampoo advertisement or an Olympic Games edition. The internet certainly had a fun time.

2. 1999 ICC World Cup

Twitter

Don't Miss 13.7 K SHARES 6.8 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 5 K SHARES 5.8 K SHARES

A unique bowling action which was eerily similar to that of then Indian pacer Debashish Mohanty

3. Denver Nuggets (1959-60)

Fox Sports

A guy jumping with a pickax. Like seriously?

4. Carolina Panthers (1995-2011)

Fox Sports

This panther clearly has a sense of entitlement.

5. Miami Heat (1990-2006)

Fox Sports

They clearly did not think this one through?

6. New England Patriots (2000-present)

Fox Sports

Was there even an effort made to spend time on this one?

7. Vegas Golden Knights (2017)

Fox Sports

Talk about going overboard!
